title: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping stairs in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A vision of sweeping the stairs or cleaning the stairs for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, for a man, whether she is washing the stairs with water. Sweeping the stairs in a dream. It is one of the dreams that many people see in dreams, which indicates many important meanings and signals that the dreamer will have in the near future, as sweeping the stairs is one of the important things that men and women do in order to have a clean entrance. With the stairs and getting rid of the dirt on the stairs and sweeping indicates positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in the near future. Interpretation of sweeping the stairs in a dream Sweeping the stairs in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems in the near future and gaining comfort and happiness in the near future. Sweeping the stairs in a dream indicates That the dreamer will enjoy goodness and happiness and will soon end many problems. Cleaning the stairs in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will find happiness and soon start a new life. Sweeping the stairs and removing dirt from it in a dream means that the dreamer will gain happiness and kindness, get rid of problems, and gain peace and peace of mind. Cleaning The stairs in a dream are evidence that the dreamer is working to fix problems in the lives of all people, including those close to him, and will succeed in ending the problems. Interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream Climbing the stairs in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will become righteous in this world and religion and will be a good and beloved person in public life. Climbing an old ladder in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will earn a lot in trade. An employee who climbs the ladder in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be promoted highly in positions and will receive many promotions. A broken ladder in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s victory over his enemies and that he will soon triumph over them. The ladder that breaks while the dreamer is standing on it is evidence that the dreamer will be able to end his problems and get rid of his problems. The wooden staircase in the dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from some problems in his life. Climbing the wooden ladder in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will succeed in keeping one away from sin. And proving that he is a religious person in his public life. Sweeping stairs in a single woman’s dream is evidence that she will enjoy happiness and kindness.

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing jasmine in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see jasmine in a dream, white jasmine in a dream, a jasmine crown, wearing a jasmine necklace, the meaning of an individual jasmine crown, seeing the cultivation of yellow jasmine, the meaning of picking jasmine in a dream, smelling the fragrance of jasmine and seeing jasmine, and jasmine is beautiful in appearance and is characterized by its strong scent and is loved by many People prefer to smell it, but seeing jasmine in a dream has many meanings and connotations that we will learn about through its interpretation. Dreaming of a jasmine tree in a dream about a married man, a pregnant woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing jasmine by Ibn Sirin: Seeing white jasmine in a dream is a sign of joy, pleasure, happiness, and happy news. The interpretation of a dream indicates Jasmine in a dream indicates marriage to a virgin girl. Jasmine also indicates a white wedding dress, and harvesting jasmine in a dream indicates marriage to a good virgin girl. The interpretation of seeing a jasmine tree in a dream indicates the abundance of a lawful life and a long life. Dreaming of smelling jasmine in a dream is evidence On the disappearance of worries and sadness and the end of disputes. Seeing Jasmine Al-Nabulsi in a dream: Seeing jasmine in a dream, as narrated by Al-Nabulsi, means to me kindness, favor, and grace. Interpretation of a dream of picking jasmine from a tree in a dream is evidence of the death of science and scholars and the spread of lies and heresies. A dream of seeing and smelling jasmine In the dream, it is an indication of the improvement of his psychological state in my opinion and the stability of his life. Seeing yourself giving jasmine in a dream indicates a conflict or conflict with someone close to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing jasmine for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about white jasmine in a song shows that she is wearing a white wedding dress and soon there will be a party. Her wedding. Seeing the smell of jasmine in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the end of her depression and the disappearance of her sadness and anxiety. The interpretation of wearing a jasmine crown in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her marriage to a good, honest, and financially capable person who loves and cares for her. The dream of seeing jasmine flowers in a dream of engagement indicates Her short marriage. Choosing jasmine in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the fulfillment of desires, successes, and achieving their goals. Interpretation of seeing jasmine for a married woman: The jasmine flower in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her marital relationship and psychological comfort and calm for her family. Seeing a married woman if her husband gives her a bouquet of jasmine, This indicates his love, affection, and concern for her. The interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing a jasmine necklace in a dream is evidence of her happy marriage, full of mutual respect, tension, and appreciation. A dream about the scent of a jasmine flower for a married woman is evidence of the end of disputes between her family members and the disappearance of tension and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about jasmine for a pregnant woman: Seeing white jasmine in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. Interpretation of the smell of jasmine in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the ease of childbirth and the ease of removing fatigue and difficulty in pregnancy. Dreaming of a jasmine wreath in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a change in her life for the better and her happiness after childbirth. Interpretation A dream about jasmine for a man: Interpretation of a dream about jasmine in

title: Interpretation of kohl in a dream Eye kohl in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about kohl for a girl, a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man to see kohl in black kohl, wearing kohl and makeup, wiping kohl off Ibn Sirin’s eye, Imam al-Sadiq, Fahd al-Osaimi and others Interpretation of kohl in a dream If you see a kohl in a dream, you want to know what it means for you, does this dream symbolize good or bad for you? You will learn with us the different interpretations of kohl in a dream. Eyeliner can be a sign of more achievements, new discoveries and the ability to bring you happiness. Kohl for a woman means that she will see a greater improvement in her professional life. When a woman dreams that she is wearing a coach, this means that she will do something that will help her change her destiny. As for the man who dreams that he sees Kohl in a dream, this means that he has a new opportunity to do the things he is afraid to do and that these efforts will lead him to success. Kohl for a man means that he needs a strong boost in self-confidence and to act decisively. If a man sees an eyeliner in a dream, this means that he will marry a beautiful and attractive woman. Seeing a girl with a kohl pen in a dream means that she is trying to achieve marital happiness despite the envy of some. When you dream of wiping kohl from your eye, this means being exposed to distress. If you dream that you are designing kohl for one of your friends, this means that joy is coming to him. Putting kohl in a dream means that you are trying to hide something from people in life. Kohl in a dream can symbolize an attempt to improve self-confidence and that you are working on self-reliance. Kohl It means that you are trying to make a good impression on others by taking care of yourself. It can also indicate that it is time to forget the past and start your life anew with other people, as it is one of the ways to escape from reality. Seeing a woman carrying a box of kohl in a dream means that she will serve others and advise them in managing their money. When you use a kohl brush, put it in the kohl and take out the kohl powder to apply it to the eyelid in a dream, this means marrying someone or earning a profit if you are poor or increasing knowledge if you are an honest person. And if the kohl contains kohl, this means that the woman seeks to profit from lying. Ibn Sirin says that kohl in a dream is money and increases a person's vision in life about the different experiences he goes through. When you see that someone has given you a little flattery in your hands, this means that he will get a little or a lot of money. When you dream that you are buying kohl, this means that you are trying to correct things in your religion and get closer to God. If you see someone wearing kohl on you and on your curtains, this means that he will take money from you in illegal ways, and if a virgin wears kohl, this means that she will get married. Kohl in a dream increases insight A person in different matters. If a blind man smears his eyes with kohl in a dream, he will miraculously recover and regain his sight. If someone smears your face with white silver powder in a dream, it means that

title: Interpretation of seeing my girlfriend in a dream for single people in different situations in detail

preview.html: In this article, we examine for you in detail from the Encyclopedia of Interpretation my friend’s vision of a single woman. In fact, friendship symbolizes many high concepts of loyalty and honesty. As for its meaning in the world of dreams, it is one of the mysterious symbols that arouses curiosity to know its meaning, and seeing friends is one of the most common visions. Which the dreamer sees, he can see that he meets an old friend, quarrels with his friends, or ends his differences with them, and this vision can only make sense to the dreamer or her friend depending on the situation, and beliefs about this vision vary between self-talk or is it a good sign if nothing disturbing happens? About it, so what did dream interpreters say about the meaning of seeing a girl in a dream for a single girl? This is what we will show you in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing my friend in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars have suggested that seeing the dreamer arguing with her friend in a dream is a sign of wrong actions that she commits in reality. In the event that the dreamer sees that she has met a friend with whom she is at odds in reality and she dreams Seeing a reconciliation between them, this is a good sign of the stability of the dreamer’s psychological state. Seeing a meeting with a friend close to the dreamer indicates that the dreamer will go through many positive changes in her life. If a single woman dreams that she meets an old friend in a dream, this means that she is going through a difficult period In her life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she has met an old friend from her childhood, then the meaning of this dream lies in the fact that she loses the ability to bear the responsibilities entrusted to her. In the case of an unmarried woman who dreams of the death of her boyfriend in a dream, and the dreamer cried without a sound, then this The dream deserves praise for the dreamer, because it indicates achieving what he wants in reality. When the dreamer dreams of a friend whom he has not known for years and she cheated on you in a dream, this means that the dreamer is being harmed by someone in reality. In the case of betrayal of a friend in a dream, it indicates This dream indicates the achievement of goodness through someone close to the dreamer. If the dreamer sees her happy friend in a dream, this reflects a lot of goodness and the achievement of her happiness on the ground. If he sees a work friend, the meaning of this lies in the fact that the dreamer achieves what he wants after great effort. When you dream of seeing a friend upset in a dream, this reflects the emergence of conflicts between her and her friend. If an unmarried woman dreams that she meets her friend and looks beautiful to her, this means kindness, livelihood, and receiving good news. If he appears inappropriate, it means that something bad will happen. The dreamer. Interpretation of my friend’s engagement in a dream for a single woman. As for the dreamer who sees her friend’s engagement, if her friend is not happy with this event in the dream, this is a sign that something bad will happen to her. In the event that an unmarried woman dreams that her friend was engaged in a dream and she was already divorced or widowed This vision is good news for her friend, as it indicates that what the dreamer desires in reality will come true. Interpretation of seeing my friend’s brother in a dream when you dream of a woman who is not dead

title: Interpretation of a dream about geese and geese in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a goose in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, eating white or black goose meat, biting a white goose, slaughtering a goose, a small green duck, attacking geese, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Seeing geese in a dream is one of the dreams that we see. They are constantly in our dreams and carry for us a large number of important meanings and associations that come to the dreamer in his interpretations, as geese are beautiful birds that are abundant in public life and many people eat them, like ducks or chicks and other beautiful birds, and we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream as the commentator explains. Ibn Sirin in his complete interpretations. Interpretation of geese in a dream: Seeing them in a dream shows women with beautiful bodies, good men, and a lot of money. If they vote, they cry. And whoever sees that he is taking care of geese is taking care of people of high rank, and takes money from them, and it has been said that geese are a symbol of worry, sadness, and power on land and sea. Wild geese, including wild geese and wild geese, seeing wild geese indicates the owners of travel, Like merchants on land and sea, local geese are people, sorrows, spouses, property, neighbors, slaves, or guardians. Perhaps a goose indicates a beautiful or fat woman, and their screams in the place are distressed and anguished due to death, burning, or drowning. And goose eggs for those who see them have a lot of money for those who take them. If you dream that geese are bothering you, this means death in your family. If you see geese swimming, this means that your wealth will gradually increase. But if you see geese in grassy places, this means sure success. If you see them dead, then you will suffer loss. And sadness. For a lover, a goose indicates the value of his fiancée. If you collect geese, you will have a palace. If you eat geese, it means a dispute over your property. Seeing white geese floating on clear water means happy events and success in business. Black geese in a dream means that you will enjoy forbidden pleasures. Seeing dead geese means satiety And boredom and a feeling of dissatisfaction and anxiety. If you see geese flying, then you should expect happy events after a while. Interpretation of geese in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing geese in a dream as evidence of being promoted to different positions in all different fields of work and obtaining a new promotion in the coming period. The poor man Whoever sees geese in a dream is evidence of wealth and abundant money in the current period. A sick person who eats geese in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness, health and well-being in the near future. Seeing a traveler eating geese in a dream is evidence of a happy life. Hearing the sound of geese in a dream is evidence of... Sadness and hearing sad news soon. As evidenced by the barking of geese at home in a dream is evidence of divorce or separation. Interpretation of geese in one dream. Seeing an unmarried woman giving her a goose in a dream is evidence of commitment to a close relationship with a person who has good morals and a prominent position. Seeing her fiancé that Her fiancé

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite by Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite: It is known that dogs are among the animals that humans own and breed. They are gentle and beloved creatures, and they have many uses in our lives in safety magazines, whether in guarding or in use. In the areas of investigation by the security authorities, today and beyond, we will show you the various interpretations of a dream about a dog bite, and what does this dream mean? Just follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dog in a dream is a cunning and deceitful person in the dreamer’s life. It also symbolizes a dog in a dream as an enemy and a cunning and deceitful person. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a young man who was bitten by a dog in a dream. However, it is an enemy that conquers and defeats this young man. Seeing a dog bite in a dream also indicates that he has committed sins and that the dreamer regrets committing them. A young man’s dream that a dog has bitten him is considered evidence that his close friends have betrayed him. As for a divorced woman’s dream that a dog wants to He bites her, this indicates her ex-husband’s desire to harm her. But if a widow dreams that a dog bites her, this indicates that there is a deceitful person around her who is trying to take her money. Interpretation of a dream about dog bites for one girl: After considering the interpretation of a dream about dog bites in general, we will now know what This is the interpretation of a dream about dogs being bitten by an unmarried girl. Follow us: If an unmarried girl dreams of dogs standing apart from her, this means that there are enemies around her who are trying to harm her. If an unmarried girl dreams that there is a black dog standing far from her, this means that there is a hypocritical person near her who is trying to harm her. If the girl Dreaming of seeing a white dog in a dream, this indicates the presence of a person with good morals in her life. Interpretation of a dream about dogs biting a married woman: If a married woman dreams of being bitten by a dog, this means that there is a corrupt person in her life, and God knows best. Seeing a dog biting a married woman in The dream indicates that her husband is cheating on her. If a married woman dreams of a gray dog, this indicates that there is injustice in her life, whether it is a husband, brother, or father. But if a married woman dreams of a brown dog, this indicates the presence of a person who is jealous of her in her environment. Interpretation of a dream A dog bite on the hand in detail: After considering the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about dog bites for single and married women, we will now look at the interpretation of dogs biting the hand: If one dreams that there are dogs biting his right hand, this means that he will be betrayed and betrayed by his friends or relatives. But if A person dreams that there are dogs biting him on his left hand, this indicates people’s rejection and hatred, and the dreamer must be careful. If someone dreams of being bitten by a dog, but his hands are cut off, this means that there is an enemy to that person and that he will defeat him. Also, a dream of biting and cutting off a hand may indicate However, the dreamer will fall into a misfortune that may lead to his death, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs biting a leg in detail: If someone dreams that a dog is biting his legs, this means that there are difficulties that he will face in his life. If someone dreams that a dog is biting his thigh, this indicates love The passion between the dreamer's friends and that the dreamer will solve all problems

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant womanChildren are among the blessings that God has given us, and everyone wishes to have them because they are the jewel of worldly life. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a boy and a girl, then this makes her feel happy and confused as well, and she wants to know the meaning of this dream and its connotations, and from During this article, we will explain in detail the different meanings of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl. A pregnant woman.Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman, Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s vision that she has given birth to twins, a boy and a girl, means that she will be able to eliminate all the crises and problems that have surrounded her recently and liberate her from all the people who expose her to them. For these problems. It is evidence that she will actually give birth to twins, a boy and a girl, who will bring happiness to her heart. If she suffers from any disease during pregnancy, this vision indicates that after giving birth she will recover from this disease. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman Ibn Sirin explained Ibn Sirin When a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to twins, a male and a female, this is a sign that she will live a life full of stability, security, luxury of life, and prosperity. It also indicates the stability of her marital relationship, which is dominated by love and understanding. The vision also shows that she and her husband will enjoy goodness and blessings in her life, and God will bless her abundantly. Livelihood. A pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to a boy and a girl, this indicates that she will receive large sums of money, but she will spend it inappropriately. It was also mentioned that seeing this boy and girl playing and laughing indicates the happiness and joy that the dreamer will enjoy. But if they are quarreling This indicates that she will face some problems and crises in her life. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. The most important interpretations of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl, for a pregnant woman. I dreamed that I gave birth to twins, a boy and a girl, while I was pregnant. The pregnant woman sees that she gave birth to twins, a boy and a girl, and was already pregnant, then the interpretation of this vision varies according to the time in which She saw this vision in him. She prays during this time that it will pass peacefully, and it is expected that these problems will end after her birth and that God will bless her with a healthy child free of diseases that will bring happiness and joy to her heart. But if the vision is in the last three months of pregnancy, this means that she will actually give birth to a boy and a girl, and she will be distinguished The girl is calm and gentle and will be characterized by a charming smile. A boy, who will be annoying in many cases and difficult to control, but these two children will be innocent for her and her husband in old age. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins for a pregnant woman. The birth of twins in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the visions that always brings goodness to its owner and is considered good news for her that she will be blessed with kindness and money. And great livelihood and live a happy life. And stability, she enjoys

title: I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him

preview.html: I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him through a website. Seeing the website roy2a.com Breastfeeding is feeding the newborn with milk that comes from the female breast by sucking the infant from the mouth. Seeing a child being breastfed in a dreamAccording to the dreamer’s condition and the events of the dream, this is how we explain the interpretations that came on the lips Great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen. This topic is for others, so follow us. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him. Seeing breastfeeding in a dream is one of the visions that came with two interpretations, one of which is that it indicates sadness and lack, and the other is an indication of tenderness and affection. Seeing a child being breastfed by a woman in a dream indicates that about the happiness and goodness of the dreamer. What About seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream? It is an indication of the sadness and anxiety that the dreamer feels. Seeing a baby breastfeeding in a man’s dream indicates his emotional and sexual need and hiding his feelings for a while. What about seeing a baby breastfeeding in a dream? Laban did not reveal himself to him, Indicating that the dreamer was trying something, but to no avail, and a sign of disappointment regarding him. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream in detail. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a young child being breastfed in a dream, and for someone who is still in childhood, is a harbinger of goodness and blessings. And food for the dreamer. What about watching a large child being breastfed? He has passed the age of weaning, and the vision is a warning of the presence of an enemy lurking in the dreamer. A woman breastfeeds an adult in a dream. Her child is not an indication that she will be exposed to a major financial crisis or a problem and crisis that she will face in the near future. See an interpretation Another: I dreamed that I took a pregnancy test and became pregnant. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him for single women. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him when I was alone. The vision is considered good news for its owner in the satisfaction of her desires, happiness near her, and good news in her next life. Seeing a small child being breastfed in one dream is an indication of the imminence of her marriage. It indicates the imminence of her marriage. Seeing a small child being breastfed in one dream means that she will often return to God in her affairs and obey Him, and stay away from sins and disobedience and everything that angers her Lord. As for seeing a small child being breastfed in one dream? She became angry and hurt by this act, as seeing it portends that something bad will happen in her life or She will be exposed to sadness and anxiety. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him for a married woman. Seeing a small child being breastfed in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has been endowed with the qualities of mercy, tenderness, and giving, and good news of sustenance and kindness that will enter her life in the near future. Seeing a breastfeeding child in a dream indicates that the woman is married if she is suffering from an illness that afflicts her. The vision is good news of her short recovery and the removal of the disease from her body, God willing. I dreamed that I was carrying a child and breastfeeding him for a man. Seeing a man breastfeeding a child in a dream indicates that he will fall into trouble and seizures, and other commentators believe that this will benefit him provided that the child is before the age of weaning. A dream about breastfeeding a man who suffers Of illness is a sign of approaching recovery. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a blade in a dream. We are pleased to show you a place

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a thigh in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a thigh in a dream. God created man in the best form, and made him in the best form, and also distinguished him from others by the grace of reason, and created him for the work of rebuilding on earth, and created him for worship, and subjected this vast universe to him to achieve benefits, and in the creation of man and in the formation of his body Various secrets and wonders, indicating the greatness of this Creator who created man and shaped him according to Him. The work and mission for which he was created and to be able to bear trust and perform the worship of God to the fullest. Interpretation of dreams to see the thigh in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the thigh for married couples: The thigh is the part that connects the upper part of the body to the knee, and the thigh is classified under the lower part of the body. It contains the longest bone in the body, which is the femur, which is the longest bone in the skeleton, reaching 48 cm in length, and it is one of the strongest bones. A married woman seeing her thigh in a dream indicates that she is living a happy married life. When a married woman sees her thighs cut off, this is a bad omen of her death. Imminent. A married woman’s dream of getting an iron leg, a good color for her and her husband. The fact that a married woman exposes her leg in front of people suggests that her secrets will be revealed. The presence of hair on a married woman’s thigh shows the difficult psychological state she is in. Seeing the thigh in a dream for a manThe thigh is the largest bone in The body has a diameter of 2.34 cm and has the ability to withstand 30 times the weight of a person. This strength results from the presence of compressed bone cells inside the thigh and is considered the basis of the muscles that exert effort. Seeing a man’s right thigh portends his shortcomings in performing his worship. Whoever is alerted by someone close to the fortuneteller to expose his thigh indicates That one of his relatives has done wrong. While the dreamer’s vision of his injured thigh indicates that he will be exposed to problems in his life. The fortuneteller’s left thigh is a good harbinger of the presence of his close and strong family by his side. Also, a man’s dream of cutting off his thigh from somewhere and wearing his thigh indicates a child who bears his name but is not his son. Revealing the dream interpretation of the thigh in a dream for single women. The thigh consists of three areas: the front thigh, the back thigh, and the final thigh, and each part has its own nerves and blood supply. The thigh contains the most important artery that transports oxygenated blood throughout the end segment. And also the main nerve: Also, for a single woman who exposes her thigh while she is satisfied, this is a harbinger of her failure to achieve her dreams. An unmarried woman saw her thigh disfigured and she was far from her homeland, which indicates her death in the place she was in. An unmarried woman feeling pain in her thigh indicates She misbehaved with some people around her. In addition, a single woman dreams that she exposes her thighs together in order to get a good taste for her relationship. Seeing an unmarried woman with an iron on her thigh indicates that she has committed sins. See also: A detailed interpretation of the dream of seeing double in a dream. Interpretation of the vision. Sound on Thigh in a dream: A person is exposed to many pains and diseases related to his plate, and these pains are thigh pain, including muscle strain, stroke, and other issues related to disease.

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling according to Ibn Sirin. The correct and comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing travel through this article. God Almighty said: “O leaders, tell me about my vision if you pass by in dreams (43). The fortuneteller's desires.Interpretation of time travel in a dream explaining in detail good and evil? This is what we answer through our encyclopedic article, as time travel is considered one of the dreams that humanity has always dreamed of in its life, due to its anticipation of the future and its desire to predict and learn about anything new. Results in our world. The world of the invisible is the one that people want to enter without knowing seriously about it, so what about the interpretation of dreams about traveling in a dream and time? Is this a laudable vision or is this never a good thing? This is what we explain in this article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about traveling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. When the dreamer sees that he is traveling in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will cross his path in life to achieve his dreams. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is traveling and the journey was difficult in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer He will face a difficult life full of problems. When the dreamer sees that he is traveling and that the trips were enjoyable in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve success and progress in his life. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is traveling in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer He will try to escape from the debts that have accumulated on him. When the dreamer sees that he is traveling in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is trying to escape from some crises and conflicts in his life. It may also indicate that the dreamer will seek to make a new beginning. Interpretations of travel dreamsWhen the dreamer sees That he is returning from the trip with many bags in the dream, it may mean that the dreamer will receive a large diet. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is traveling by train in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be a very confident person. If a person sees In a dream, he is traveling from one place to another. This vision indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better. A person who sees his great happiness in a dream because of a trip also symbolizes positive changes occurring in his life. If he sees that he is traveling by plane. This vision expresses that this person will achieve many successes in his studies, or in his work, and that he will be able to achieve many benefits. As for seeing a traveler by car; This vision indicates the success that the dreamer will experience in the emotional side of his life. If the patient sees that he is traveling by car. The vision symbolizes recovery from his illness. If the person is traveling on foot. It reflects the many debts he has. If the patient sees that he is traveling to an unknown destination. This vision expresses the death of the dreamer. Seeing travel in a dream generally expresses the dreamer’s effort to reach his goals. But if a person sees the joy of traveling in a dream. This vision symbolizes his ability to succeed. Another interpretation of seeing travel in a dream is the dreamer’s inability to pay his debts and it also shows his desire to renew his life. If
